name: A Movers Cube
description:
Play as a Cube that can defeat enemies with his super sword. You can also collect coins and find secrets. IMPORTANT: Unfortunately this game will be receiving no more updates as I have moved on and is in the progress of making Fighters Ragdoll(I might come back to it though)

Notes for 1.4 Update Options

Added

A new options menu 

A new title screen text 

Added Graphics Controls including: Vsync, FullScreen, and Resolution

Added new menu for Language inside options menu that include English, French, and  Spanish

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Removed

Player Speed adjustable

Fixed

Teleporters not working when you step on them

Wall particle

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Something I forgot to say in the last update changelog was that the Enemy's can go up stairs
